issue.title: [CF 163] TellMeWhen completely stopped working
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Just logging on to the game
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

Sorry, I'm not being awkward, but nothing happens, it just doesn't load.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)  version 4.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?

1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\cooldown.lua:51: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\buff.lua:50: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\reactive.lua:46: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\wpnenchant.lua:40: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\totem.lua:42: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\icd.lua:44: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\unitcooldown.lua:43: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\cast.lua:43: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\Types\meta.lua:25: attempt to call method 'RegisterIconType' (a nil value)
1x TellMeWhen-4.0.2\conditions.lua:27: hooksecurefunc(): OnInitialize is not a function
TellMeWhen-4.0.2\conditions.lua:27: in main chunk

Please provide any additional information below.

Out of all the add ons in this game, this one has stood out for me.  I hope you manage to fix it, good luck, Regards Wulfrune GM Dusk Ronin , Ragnaros.  Wulfrune@blueyonder.co.uk


> Posted by CurseForge user Wulfrune | Imported from CurseForge issue #163 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua

<p>TMW lua</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user Wulfrune

Looks to me like TellMeWhen.lua has either been completely deleted from Interface/AddOns/TellMeWhen, did not install properly, or has been corrupted. A reinstall should fix this for you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
